Text: If you get 403 error from imageshack, copy the link, open a new tab, paste it and hit enter. Imageshack obviously started to check referers and blocks people coming directly from TPB.
The subs are offin timing and sometimes they aren't there at all. I had to keep translating for my brother.

@nycrea
You're a fucking idiot. The subs are ok. And there are even the original vob subs included. But it seems you walk this planet with your head stuck up your arse, if you're too dumb to use vob subs.
